name: Scottland
startIntroPart1: Mary, Queen of Scots, You were a true visionary. You recognized the importance of education and the power of knowledge, and sought to build a more enlightened and peaceful Scotland. Your legacy of leadership and her commitment to progress serve as an inspiration to us all, and Your story reminds us of the importance of standing up for what we believe in, even in the face of insurmountable odds.
startIntroPart2: Mary, Queen of Scots, You were a fascinating and complex figure. Your life was shrouded in tragedy and Your legacy is filled with contradictions, But Will You able to Change That and Stand The Test Of Time?
declaringWar: You.... You! Are Unfit to Rule a Nation, I shall Destroy you.
defeated: How Could This Happened, Who Will Save Us.
introduction: Greetings, I'm Mary The Queen of Scotts, I think we'll be a Good Freind, If You Fit in into My Court.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
